Job Description Summary:

Join Our Journey at The Coca-Cola Company

At The Coca-Cola Company, we pride ourselves on building beloved brands and fostering growth both as a company and as individuals. We're inviting you to join our exciting evolution.

We are leveraging our strengths‚Äîour brands, financial power, global reach, distribution system, and dedicated team‚Äîto become a sustainable growth company and one of the most respected in the world.

As a Generative AI Intern, you'll develop cutting-edge consumer experiences using advanced technology, data insights, and bold innovation. You'll lead collaborations on innovative projects, embracing agile working and proactiveness

Why Join Us?

  • Iconic Brands:¬†Work with world-renowned brands like Coca-Cola, Fanta, Sprite, Minute Maid, Powerade, Dasani, Smart Water, Vitamin Water, Simply, Honest Tea, Fairlife, Fuze Tea, Topo Chico, and more.

  • Meaningful Work:¬†Engage in projects that challenge you and help you develop world-class skills.

  • Global Impact:¬†Collaborate with teams across 190+ countries.

  • Passionate Culture:¬†Convert your passion into action in a unique and dynamic environment.

  • Competitive Compensation:¬†Enjoy the benefits and rewards of working with a global leader.

  • Innovative Technology:¬†Embrace the future of marketing with the power of Generative AI, and create cutting-edge consumer experiences in a fast-paced environment.

What We Expect From You:

  • Impactful Contribution:¬†Make a difference and turn your passion into action.

  • Creative Thinking:¬†Bring fresh ideas and innovative solutions.

  • Learning Mindset:¬†Absorb every experience as an opportunity to grow.

  • Collaborative Spirit:¬†Thrive in diverse teams and embrace different perspectives.

  • Commercial Acumen:¬†Understand the challenges of sustainability and drive pragmatic solutions.

What You'll Do:

  • Contribute to the development of innovative, AI-powered marketing experiences.

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (engineers, researchers, data analysts, trend forecasters and designers) to define project scope and direction.

  • Explore and experiment with emerging Generative AI technologies and their applications in marketing.

  • Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute creative ideas.

  • Apply agile methodologies to project execution and deliver impactful results.

  • Have the opportunity to see your work potentially impact millions of consumers .

Education Requirement:

  • Currently pursuing a Bachelor's engineering degree majoring in Computer Science and/or Machine Learning with a final graduation date no earlier than December 2025.

Skills & Attributes:

  • Marketing Concepts: Apply basic marketing concepts in developing marketing plans (e.g., brand positioning, SWOT Analysis, consumer segmentation).

  • Thought Generation: Innovate and think creatively about consumer trends and product development. A passion for exploring the intersection of AI and marketing.

  • Collaboration & Communication: Work cross-functionally, listen empathetically, and communicate effectively. Possess strong communication skills, both written and verbal.

  • Adaptability: Thrive in complex, ambiguous, and fast-paced environments.

  • Technical Skills: Familiarity with software engineering best practices and experience in real-time data collection and analysis is a plus.

  • Passion: Be passionate about consumer marketing and The Coca-Cola Company

Join us and be part of a company that values your passion, creativity, and ambition. Apply now and start your journey with The Coca-Cola Company!

Travel:¬† Summer internships may require limited travel based on assignment

Work Location:¬† The Coca-Cola Company Headquarters in Atlanta, GA

Monthly Compensation:¬†$4,506

Skills:

Our Purpose and Growth Culture:

We are taking deliberate action to nurture an inclusive culture that is grounded in our company purpose, to refresh the world and make a difference. We act with a growth mindset, take an expansive approach to what‚Äôs possible and believe in continuous learning to improve our business and ourselves. We focus on four key behaviors ‚Äì curious, empowered, inclusive and agile ‚Äì and value how we work as much as what we achieve. We believe that our culture is one of the reasons our company continues to thrive after 130+ years. Visit Our Purpose and Vision¬†to learn more about these behaviors and how you can bring them to life in your next role at Coca-Cola.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class. When we collect your personal information as part of a job application or offer of employment, we do so in accordance with industry standards and best practices and in compliance with applicable privacy laws.
